page.about.title: About Us - FilmScore
page.about.intro.p1: FilmScore is a project created by two students: Dima Matyushchenko and Misha Efteni.
page.about.intro.p2: We are aspiring Junior Developers passionate about web technologies and cinema.
page.about.mission.p1: The main goal of FilmScore is to provide a user-friendly platform for discovering, rating, and discussing movies and TV series. We aim to create a community where film enthusiasts can share their opinions and find new favorites.
page.about.mission.p2: We believe that sharing experiences enriches the way we perceive art, and cinema is a powerful form of it.
page.about.team.dima.name: Dima Matyushchenko
page.about.team.dima.bio: Specializes in frontend development and creating intuitive user interfaces. Strives to bring ideas to life with clean code and modern design, ensuring the best user experience.
page.about.team.misha.name: Misha Efteni
page.about.team.misha.bio: Passionate about backend development and building reliable, scalable server-side applications. Enjoys solving complex technical challenges and ensuring stable system performance.
page.about.future.p1: We are constantly working on improving FilmScore and adding new features. Stay tuned for more updates!
page.contact.title: Contact Us - FilmScore
page.contact.intro.p1: If you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to us. We'd love to hear from you!
